title: Worktree CLI Configuration
description: Configuration schema for .worktreerc files used by worktree-cli

$schema.description: Path to the JSON schema for IDE validation and autocomplete

post_create.description: Shell commands to run after creating a new worktree. Commands are executed in the newly created worktree directory.

pre_remove.description: Shell commands to run before removing a worktree. Commands are executed in the worktree directory that is about to be removed.

post_remove.description: Shell commands to run after removing a worktree. Commands are executed in the main worktree directory.

copy_files.description: Files to copy from the main worktree to newly created worktrees. Paths are relative to the worktree root.

items.description: A file path relative to the worktree root
